An individual post follows.

The Convienience of Poverty

The upshot of hardly earning a damn thing is not having to pay federal and state taxes on it. The downside is, well, being broke (he says after discussion of digital camera cases). But I was shocked when looking up tax-related at IRS.gov: the site is a close to usable as I think anything IRS-related could possibly be. Almost makes me wish I was paying taxes just to try out their multitude of electronic filing services (free if you’re down at the heels!). Almost.

—Apr 14, 2003
